title: Spintires MudRunner [qoob RePack]
description:
INFORMATION:
Year of manufacture: October 31, 2017
Genre: Simulation
Developer: Saber Interactive
Publisher: Focus Home Interactive
Publication Type: RePack
Language: ENG/MULTI
Language of voice: ENG
Tablet: Enclosure (SSE)

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
✔ Operating system: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
✔ Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.0 GHz, AMD Athlon X2 4200+
✔ Operating system memory: 2 GB
✔ Video card: GeForce 9600 GT / Radeon HD 3850
✔ Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX® 9.0
✔ Free space on hard disk: 695 mb

DESCRIPTION:
Spintires: MudRunner is the coolest version of the cult game Spintires, which sold a million copies. As in Spintires, Spintires: MudRunner offers players to sit at the wheel of an SUV and ride on an extreme Siberian off-road with only a map and a compass! Unlike its predecessor, this edition includes a new sandbox card in addition to the 5 zones of the original game, full graphics processing, a new "Match" mode with 9 new maps, 13 new SUVs and other significant improvements. This is not just an extended edition, it's a full-fledged off-road simulator! You will have 19 powerful SUVs to choose from, each of which has its own characteristics and attached equipment. Carry out tasks and carry out delivery, overcoming obstacles and dangerous conditions in the wild extreme off-road with a dynamic change of day and night. Explore realistic sandbox zones with improved graphics. Drive through muddy roads, cross rivers and other obstacles that realistically react to the weight and movements of your SUV due to the advanced physics of the game engine. Armed with a map, compass, winch and driver's own skill, go on a solo trip or join the other three players in cooperative multiplayer. Download the mods created by the active community and get a lot of additional content in the constantly evolving world of Spintires: MudRunner
